Vehement/Unicron/Sun Crusher/Reflector:



Vehement hovered in the air, watching the spectacle.  He looked to his master 
and lord, Unicron.  "Orders, Chaos-Bringer?"

The age-old being looked to all his fellow Brotherhood members and gave a 
slight smile.  "Now, we crush these heathens who dare invade our territory.  
They dare attack our base and besmearch us by doing so.  And by doing so, 
they attack me.  No one attacks me.  Kill all the heathens, take no 
prisoners, use any means necessary!" he yelled.

Vehement raised both arms, each arms launching two energy-signature seeking 
missiles.  Two of those missiles headed for Darkfate.  The other two of the 
same type headed for Dragonfly.

---

Unicron raised both arms, an orb of black energy forming in his left hand and 
dropping downward towards Attilla, the orb having the power of a few charges.

Raising his right arm he launched two energy-signature seeking missiles at 
Ocipite.

---

Sun Crusher raised an arm, launching a seeking missile at one of the bat 
probes, firing five optic blasts at another.  In his left hand a missile 
launcher from subspace appeared.  The Brotherhood warrior moved that arm to 
the right, pulling the large trigger of the weapon twice, a missile heading 
for Shivah and another missile heading for Kali.

---

Reflector smiled and waited until after his allies had fired and raised a 
double-barreled cannon attached to his right wrist, firing off a missile from 
each of the barrels.  One energy-signature seeking missile headed for Alecto. 
 The other of the same type began a pursuit of a bat probe.

---

Unicron activated a commlink with Darkfate and made a guttural noise that a 
robot could not make. 

 "Leave my territory or you shall die, your head resting on a pike as a 
reminder of what happens when you invade the Brotherhood's land and try and 
destroy their property!"
